card.text: Are you sure to be granted for accessing that kind of page ?

Home.title: Year 2042 - Planet Earth
Home.text: Invaded by an alien race similar to our computers, humanity is in danger. You and your hacker friends try to infiltrate the great alien temple. Your mission: capture an Alien-CPU and bring it back.
